name: Quest for Glory 4 1/2: So You Thought You Were a Hero?
name_original: Quest for Glory 4 1/2: So You Thought You Were a Hero?
description:
Quest for Glory 4 1/2: So You Thought You Were a Hero? is an adventure game developed by QFG 4 1/2 Team. It was originally released in 2001. It was published by QFG 4 1/2 Team.
Quest for Glory 4 1/2: So You Thought You Were a Hero? is available on PC.
